post.author: 황성규
post.content:
Royal Ontario Museum http://www.rom.on.ca/
"Korean Nights"
on March 30, Friday
All the Korean community members are cordially invited to the special event night which honours and celebrates the Korean culture and the Korean-Canadian community in Toronto.
Free Admission(Normally $ 12 per person) 4:30-9:30 P.M.
The Korean Children's Story Recited by a Professional Storyteller
Korean Music Performances at 7:00 -7:45 p.m. and 8:15-9:00 p.m. in the Main Hall (Samuel Hall Currelly Gallery)
Children's Choir, and a Variety of Performances throughout the evening at Eaton Court.
Inquiry: Mrs. Moneca Yardley Program Producer Royal Ontario Museum (Tel) 416-586-5560
post.title: Korean Night,Royal Ontario Museum,Free,March 30
